subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin St. Louis reached 1,000 career points with a goal and an assist, Cam Talbot made 26 saves and the Rangers shut out the Flyers for the second time in nine days.
snippet: Martin St. Louis reached 1,000 career points with a goal and an assist, Cam Talbot made 26 saves and the Rangers shut out the Flyers for the second time in nine days.
